comments.body: add: for example a weighted mean calculation, link to: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Weighted_arithmetic_mean

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +91,95 @@.. ipython:: python

   def weighted_mean(x):
       arr = np.ones((1, x.shape[1]))
       arr[:, :2] = (x[:, :2] * x[:, 2]).sum(axis=0) / x[:, 2].sum()
